statements: SELECT player_id, player_name, player_behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_behavior_type = 'positive' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT player_name FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT player_id, player_behavior_type FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_behavior_type IN ('good', 'bad') ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_behavior_type, behavior_timestamp, player_id FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_behavior_type = 'chat' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_behavior_type IN ('chat', 'action') ORDER BY player_id ASC, behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND behavior_timestamp <= '2023-01-31' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(player_behavior_type) AS behavior_count FROM PlayerBehavior GROUP BY player_id HAVING behavior_count > 10 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_behavior
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive'
SELECT player_id, behavior_timestamp FROM player_behavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, favorite_game FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_game = 'Chess'
SELECT player_id, email_notifications FROM player_preferences WHERE email_notifications = true
SELECT * FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND behavior_timestamp <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_game IN ('Chess', 'Puzzle') AND email_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_behavior_count FROM player_behavior GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_behavior_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM player_behavior JOIN player_preferences USING (player_id) WHERE email_notifications = FALSE ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerBehavior;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM PlayerBehavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive';
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM GamePreferences WHERE game_platform = 'PC';
SELECT player_id, communication_preference, notification_preference FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPreferences ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_details FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM GamePreferences WHERE game_genre = 'Action' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, communication_preference, notification_preference FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE player_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_behavior
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM player_behavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM player_behavior WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive'
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM player_behavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, behavior_type FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND preference_type = 'sound';
SELECT * FROM player_behavior pb JOIN player_preferences pp ON pb.player_id = pp.player_id WHERE pb.behavior_type = 'negative' AND pp.preference_value = 'dark_theme';
SELECT player_id, game_id, behavior_type FROM campaign_tracking WHERE player_id = 2 AND game_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, behavior_timestamp FROM player_behavior WHERE player_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players;
SELECT player_name, theme_preference FROM players JOIN player_preferences ON players.player_id = player_preferences.player_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name, action_type FROM players JOIN player_actions ON players.player_id = player_actions.player_id JOIN games ON player_actions.game_id = games.game_id;

SELECT player_name, game_name, release_date FROM players JOIN player_game_preferences ON players.player_id = player_game_preferences.player_id JOIN games ON player_game_preferences.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, theme_preference FROM player_preferences WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT game_name, game_genre, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, favorite_game FROM player_game_preferences WHERE favorite_game = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, action_type, action_date FROM player_actions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
